title: Gut Health
author: Matthew Kadey MS RD
description: Gut health is central to your overall health, and clean eating can fuel your gut and its well-being. Find gut health recipes, tips and news at Clean Eating.
cleaned_text: [ The 5 Best Gut-Friendly Foods to Add to Your Breakfast, According to an RD ](https://www.cleaneatingmag.com/clean-diet/gut-health/best-gut-friendly-foods-breakfast/) For a healthier gut and body, eat these foods in the morning and give your good bacteria a boost.
